Title: Requires the commissioner of health to develop and implement a system for uniform patient safety
Summary: Requires the commissioner of health to develop and implement a system for uniform patient safety and provide systematic and standard application of a color system for wrist bands to aid in the classification and identification of safety conditions.
LawCode: Add ยง25, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to requiring the commissioner of health to develop and implement a system for uniform patient safety
